summary: The diff adds a new StudentResultLookupCard with roll-number search, Enter-to-search, clear/reset behavior, inline not-found messaging, and department-aware lookup behavior (search filtered dataset first, then optionally detect existence in full dataset to show a department-specific message). One potential AC gap is the lack of an explicit input label text "Hallticket No / Roll No" (only placeholder/description are visible in the snippet). The diff summary also indicates several additional changes (Excel parsing modes, chart changes, adding xlsx/CDN, placeholder hooks) that are not requested by REQ-5/REQ-6.

missing_requirements.requirement: On the dashboard screen, there is an input labeled "Hallticket No / Roll No".
missing_requirements.reason: In the added lookup card, the input shows a placeholder "Enter Hallticket No / Roll No" and the card description mentions the text, but the diff snippet does not show a dedicated visible label element with the exact label text.

hallucinated_features.description: Excel parser updated with dual-mode wide/long sheet support and explicit department/branch column detection, plus populating a departments list in ParsedData.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5/REQ-6 describe a client-side lookup respecting an existing department filter context; they do not request expanding Excel parsing formats or adding new parsing capabilities beyond what's needed for lookup UI behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Chart component behavior changes (e.g., SimpleBarChart dynamic width/scrolling).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5/REQ-6 are specifically about adding roll/hallticket lookup UI and department-aware messaging, not about modifying chart rendering.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated frontend dependencies and loading SheetJS via CDN (xlsx dependency and index.html changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5/REQ-6 do not request changing Excel parsing libraries or build/dependency approach; they focus on using already-loaded parsed Excel data for lookup.

hallucinated_features.description: Added placeholder React Query hooks file (useQueries.ts).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5/REQ-6 do not request introducing React Query or adding placeholder hooks.
